title: Tool
description:
The prog-rock legends are back - TOOL will be making their way to New Zealand for one epic concert at Vector Arena on Wednesday 8 May, 2013!
With over 20 years dominating the rock world, Tool established themselves long ago as one of the truly can't-miss bands of their generation and a must-have for any rock music aficionado.
Sober, Stinkfist, Lateralus, Schism, Ã†nima, The Pot - you know these songs (and more), and now you'll be able to experience them live in person and get a first taste of what's to come on their upcoming album.
Critics have hailed Tool as one of the greatest live rock bands in recent memory.
"Mate I've seen Tool and they're bloody good." - Riccardo, Music Director, The Rock
General tickets go on sale 9am Tuesday 19 February from Ticketmaster. An exclusive ticket pre-sale is available for Frontier Touring members at midday Thursday 14 February (for 24 hours only) - to get your hands on some, visit www.frontiertouring.com/tool.
So grab a ticket, dust off your copy of Undertow or Lateralus and get your body ready for May the 8th - cause it's guaranteed to be one of the most explosive nights of the year!
